history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Forbes and Murray
TTS Okay, leaving from murray avenue at forbes avenue far side. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER one 30
TTS Okay, travelling at 03:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 41 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to Murray avenue at Bartlett St far side. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER Hello.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61D <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue at Tennyson avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 3:09pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER Okay.

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Pittsburgh International airport lower level.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 3:29pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 2 of 4, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 36 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Murray avenue far side. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61B <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Morewood avenue far side . .</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 3:14pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Pittsburgh International airport lower level.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 3:25pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Sure.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER No, thank you.
TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
